revised_title: Asymptotic Solution for Diffusion into a Slender Growing Root
tldr: The article presents a mathematical model for diffusion through a semi-infinite medium into a slender, axisymmetric root that grows along its axis. The author uses an asymptotic solution based on the hypotheses that the root is slender and that the growth rate is small compared with the radial-diffusion rate. The study provides an approximate solution to the integral equation and calculates the total uptake of the diffusing substance by the root.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Science
